程序包 univers

类 Npc_Merchant

java.lang.Object
univers.BaseDeNpc
univers.Npc_Merchant
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Npc_Merchant extends BaseDeNpc
Represents a merchant NPC (Non-Player Character) in the game, capable of greeting, interaction, and trading.
